import React from 'react'; import './card.css'; import line from './line.png'; import Popup from './Popup'; import {useState} from 'react'; const Save =({name,email,id,number,depart,arrive,prix,date,hd,ha,onPayment,bagage,nbrplacedispo,typevehicule,confortvoiture})=>{ const [buttonPopup,setButtonPopup] = useState(false); return (

{name}


+212 {number}

{date}

{depart}

{hd}

{arrive}

{ha}

{bagage}
Voiture : {typevehicule}
Place : {nbrplacedispo}
Confort : {confortvoiture}

{prix} DH

Evaluer conducteur :
); } export default Save;
